Package managment

Class RegNewAccountP1Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • managment.RegNewAccountP1Controller
  • public class RegNewAccountP1Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for registering an account , in this controller we register account details and later move on to RegNewAccountP2 to complete the registration process
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    daniel aibinder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private boolean CheckInput()
      Private function CheckInput checks for valid input in Account registration form returns True for valid input, False for invalid input
      void initialize()
      This func initializes our controller, if we went back to this screen from P2 we initalizes text fields with data the user has already inputted We also initalizes Listeners to verify input in text areas
      private boolean isNumeric​(java.lang.String strNum)
      Function to check if a string is numbers using a regex pattern
      private boolean isValidName​(java.lang.String name)
      Function to validate names we check using a regex pattern
      (package private) void NextPage​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Function to go to next page, account details in this page are saved to new_account
      (package private) void openReg2​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      function on hyper link press event, opening a popup to userlareadyhasanaccountscreen.fxml Opens when user pressed "user already has an account?"
      private boolean validateEmail​(java.lang.String emailStr)
      Function to validate correct email address (ending with shtrudol and .com and so on) using a regex pattarn
